name: The Aliens Vengeance
description:
A mobile sidescroller game where you can play as 4 mutated animals to fight against the aliens who've come to steal all the cows from our planet.

This game was made using Corona Labs as an academic project at Feevale University.

PS. The game is only available in Brazilian Portuguese.

The team:

Caio Rosa;

Giordano Jankovski;

Lucas Schierholt;

Luis Almeida.
